Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.view.ClientView
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.GUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Observer
public class GUI
extends ClientView
GUI is the graphic interface of ClientView. position is player's position in game. turn refers to if it's player's turn or not. connected refers to if player connect to Server or not.

  • Nested Class Summary

    • launchGUI

      public void launchGUI()
      create a new ClientSocket and add this as observer. Then launch a new GUI without any info about server connection.
      Overrides:
      launchGUI in class ClientView

    • launchGUI

      public void launchGUI​(java.lang.String hostname, int port)

      Overrides:
      launchGUI in class ClientView

      Overrides:

      Parameters:

    • leaderCardChoice

      public void leaderCardChoice​(Message message)
      Specified by:
      leaderCardChoice in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      message - is LEADER_CHOICE message. go to Init scene and ask player to chose two of the four received LeaderCards.

    • okMessage

      public void okMessage()
      if current scene is Nickname scene wait other players. if currentState is BUY_CARD_STATE or END_TURN_STATE set currentState as END_TURN_STATE and disable YourTurnScene buttons. if currentState is FIRST_POWER_STATE or ACTIVATE_PRODUCTION_STATE set currentState as ACTIVATE_PRODUCTION_STATE and enable production buttons. if currentState is TAKE_MARBLE_STATE, ask player to chose another marble or if there aren't any remaining set currentState as END_TURN_STATE. if currentState is WHITE_CONVERSION_STATE go to TAKE_MARBLE_STATE if there are remaining marbles to be chosen, otherwise go to END_TURN_STATE.
      Overrides:
      okMessage in class ClientView

    • turnMessage

      public void turnMessage​(Message message)
      Specified by:
      turnMessage in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      message - is TURN message. if param = 1 set turn as true and enable action buttons, otherwise set turn as false.

    • endTurnMessage

      public void endTurnMessage​(Message message)
      Specified by:
      endTurnMessage in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      message - is END_TURN message. if player has just finished it's turn simply set turn as false. Instead if it wasn't player's turn, evaluates if now it's him turn and in case set turn as true and enable action buttons.

    • isMyTurn

      public static boolean isMyTurn()

    • buyCardMessage

      public void buyCardMessage​(Message message)
      Overrides:
      buyCardMessage in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      message - is BUY_CARD message. if player has bought card, add to his slot. add received message to messages ScrollPane.

    • cardRemoveMessage

      public void cardRemoveMessage​(Message message)
      Overrides:
      cardRemoveMessage in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      message - is CARD_REMOVE message. replace deck card with the new received. add received message to messages ScrollPane.

    • marketChange

      public void marketChange​(Message message)
      Overrides:
      marketChange in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      message - is MARKET_CHANGE message. slide market row or column. add received message to messages ScrollPane.

    • faithPointsMessage

      public void faithPointsMessage​(Message message)
      Overrides:
      faithPointsMessage in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      message - is FAITH_POINTS_INCREASE message. if player has increased faith points (or Ludovico), move red (or black) cross on faith track. add received message to messages ScrollPane.

      public void increaseWarehouseMessage​(Message message)
      Overrides:
      increaseWarehouseMessage in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      message - is INCREASE_WAREHOUSE message. if player has increased his warehouse, add new resource in the chosen depot. add received message to messages ScrollPane.

      public void switchDepotMessage​(Message message)
      Overrides:
      switchDepotMessage in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      message - is SWITCH_DEPOT message. if player has switched his depots, swap it. add received message to messages ScrollPane.

    • leaderCardActivationMessage

      public void leaderCardActivationMessage​(Message message)
      Overrides:
      leaderCardActivationMessage in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      message - is LEADER_ACTIVATION message. if player has activate a LeaderCard, make LeaderCard opacity as 1, and if necessary switch with the other LeaderCard. add received message to messages ScrollPane.

      Overrides:
      leaderCardDiscardMessage in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      message - is LEADER_DISCARD message. if player has discard a LeaderCard, make LeaderCard ImageView as null add received message to messages ScrollPane.

      Overrides:
      takeMarbleMessage in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      message - is TAKE_MARBLE message. set chosen marbles and set currentState as TAKE_MARBLE_STATE. Then ask player to chose one of them.

      Parameters:

      Specified by:
      whiteConversionCardMessage in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      message - is WHITE_CONVERSION message. ask player to chose one of his two active WhiteConversionCard.

    • vaticanReportMessage

      public void vaticanReportMessage​(Message message)
      Overrides:
      vaticanReportMessage in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      message - is VATICAN_REPORT message. add right vatican report tile on player's faithTrack based on his victory points. add received message to messages ScrollPane.

    • chosenSlotMessage

      public void chosenSlotMessage​(Message message)
      Specified by:
      chosenSlotMessage in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      message - is CHOSEN_SLOT message. ask player to chose one available slot for insert DevelopmentCard.

    • quitMessage

      public void quitMessage​(Message message)
      Specified by:
      quitMessage in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      message - is a QUIT message. this message could be received if another player disconnect or if Client disconnect from Server. in case game already started, display a disconnection message. in case game is not started yet, do nothing. disable all buttons except radiobutOtherPlayboard and make end game button visible.

    • endGameMessage

      public void endGameMessage​(Message message)
      Specified by:
      endGameMessage in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      message - is a END_GAME message. display info about winner victory points and resource. disable all buttons except radiobutOtherPlayboard and make end game button visible.

    • emptySlotError

      public void emptySlotError()
      inform player has chosen an empty slot for card production. if currentState it's FIRST_POWER_STATE return to FIRST_ACTION_STATE and enable actions button.
      Specified by:
      emptySlotError in class ClientView

    • wrongPowerError

      public void wrongPowerError()
      inform player has chosen a wrong production power, such as leader card power of a not AdditionalProductionPowerCard or an inactive LeaderCard, or choosing one production power for the second time. if currentState it's FIRST_POWER_STATE return to FIRST_ACTION_STATE and enable actions button.
      Specified by:
      wrongPowerError in class ClientView

    • notEnoughCardsError

      public void notEnoughCardsError()
      inform player that he can't activate the chosen LeaderCard.
      Specified by:
      notEnoughCardsError in class ClientView

    • fullSlotError

      public void fullSlotError()
      inform player that he can't insert selected DevelopmentCard in any slot. set currentState as FIRST_ACTION_STATE.
      Specified by:
      fullSlotError in class ClientView

    • illegalOperationError

      public void illegalOperationError()
      inform player that he can't perform selected operation at this moment.
      Specified by:
      illegalOperationError in class ClientView

    • impossibleSwitchError

      public void impossibleSwitchError()
      inform player that he can't switch selected depots.
      Specified by:
      impossibleSwitchError in class ClientView

    • notEnoughResourceError

      public void notEnoughResourceError()
      inform player that he hasn't enough resource to perform selected operation. if currentState is BUY_CARD_STATE return to FIRST_ACTION_STATE. if currentState is FIRST_POWER_STATE, disable all production buttons and return to FIRST_ACTION_STATE.
      Specified by:
      notEnoughResourceError in class ClientView

    • alreadyActiveError

      public void alreadyActiveError()
      inform player that he tried to activate or discard an active LeaderCard.
      Specified by:
      alreadyActiveError in class ClientView

    • alreadyDiscardError

      public void alreadyDiscardError()
      inform player that he tried to activate or discard a discarded LeaderCard.
      Specified by:
      alreadyDiscardError in class ClientView
